title: My pixel 2 xl won't boot up to system or recovery as I get Can't find valid operating system error. The device is locked so I can't flash anything over boatloader mode.
content:
I've tried to boot up to recovery; no luck
I've tried to flash stock images in boatloader, but as my device is locked it didn't work.
I've tried to enable flash unlock to flash the update afterwards but it didn't work.
When I press and hold the volume up button while the device is normally booting up I get into a screen saying download mode then it goes to the other screen (attached) . In this state, my PC gives me a notification that a USB device is connected but when I type adb or fastboot devices I don't find my device.
